amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to look to expedite already authorized U.S. Army Corp of Engineers projects in the declared disaster areas of Texas, Florida, Georgia, Louisiana, South Carolina, Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Olson amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Olson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Olson amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
